input_text:
Job Title: Manager, Customer Supply Chain Target

Location: Minneapolis, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Newell Brands is a leading $8.5B consumer products company with a portfolio of iconic brands such as Graco®, Coleman®, Oster®, Rubbermaid® and Sharpie®, and 28,000 talented employees around the world. Our high-performance culture, unparalleled curiosity about the world around us, and talented people fuel our success. Our culture is enabled through our core values which guide all we do and how we win as One Newell. They are Integrity, Teamwork, Passion for Winning, Ownership & Leadership.

The Customer Supply Chain Manager (CSCM) will be the single point of contact for the customer as well as internal Sales and Customer Service teams. Leveraging Newell Brand’s scale to unlock capabilities and better serve our strategic customer CSCM will utilize a customer centric approach and optimize total delivered cost, mitigate risks, and enable joint growth of the business. The CSCM will lead multiple supply chain processes and initiatives to deliver best-in-class service of a multi node business, while considering inventory positions, lead-times, freight utilization, and customer compliance programs. A good candidate will be able to collaborate with the customer, Business Unit supply-chains, and central support functions for an optimal go-to-market strategy and execution. The candidate is results oriented, KPI focused, and action driven.

Primary Duties And Responsibilities

 Customer Interaction – The CSCM will maintain effective relationships with inventory and supply chain counterparts at Target to leverage collaboration for mutual growth and profitability. Frequent contacts with the customer will be required to help forecast replenishment patterns and management inventory effectively. He/She will develop a long-term strategic perspective on business trends including shipments, Sales, Inventory Performance Metrics, and marketplace dynamics to make forecast and order recommendations. Sales Interaction – This role serves as the voice of the customer to influence business decisions and practices that deliver optimal results across the joint supply chain. The CSCM provides ongoing guidance and support to the sales teams regarding forecasting, capacity, freight management, and other operational/supply chain inputs for success. The CSCM will understand and communicate strategies, limitations, and planning needs to successfully meet internal and customer expectations. Forecasting – The CSCM aligns with the customer and Newell Brands teams to identify and interpret key demand signals and corresponding impacts on customer and internal inventory positions. The CSCM works with business segments’ Demand Planning team to translate this information into forecast inputs. This position understands forecasting complexities and sources of variability to align resources that support the changes in consumer demand. Distribution & Transportation Leadership– This role is designated as the customer subject matter expert on distribution & transportation topics, order flow execution, and customer compliance programs. The Transportation and Customer Service teams utilize this person to identify key improvement opportunities to minimize the cost of servicing the business. Projects may include volume analysis, creating event load planning recommendations, lead-time analysis and identifying alternative shipment modes. This person will routinely share best practices with his/her peers and with the business segments to drive ongoing reduction in the cost to serve.

Education, Experience & Skills Profile

 Bachelor’s Degree required, Supply Chain or related Business preferred 5+ years Target/Mass/Club business experience marked with addressing significant customer supply chain initiatives Solid understanding of Target data systems, organizational roles, and supply chain processes Proven ability to form and maintain positive relationships within the customer and internal functions Excellent organization and analytical skills Proficiency with Microsoft Excel required High level of proficiency in executive level communication and presentation Sound analytical and financial acumen

Experience With SAP And Power BI, Preferred

_

Newell Brands (NASDAQ: NWL) is a leading global consumer goods company with a strong portfolio of well-known brands, including Rubbermaid, Sharpie, Graco, Coleman, Rubbermaid Commercial Products, Yankee Candle, Paper Mate, FoodSaver, Dymo, EXPO, Elmer’s, Oster, NUK, Spontex and Campingaz. We are focused on delighting consumers by lighting up everyday moments. Newell Brands and its subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity Employers and comply with applicable employment laws. EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled are encouraged to apply.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
